title: Legal Notice for Civil and Criminal Defamation and Claim for Damages
content:
LEGAL NOTICE

(Under the instructions of my Client)

Ref. No. LN/DEF/2026/001
Dated: January 25, 2026

TO,

Mr. Arun Sharma
S/o Late Mr. Vijay Sharma
Editor-in-Chief
"The Daily Sentinel" News Portal
201, Media Tower, Sector 18
Noida, Uttar Pradesh - 201301

**SUBJECT: LEGAL NOTICE FOR CIVIL AND CRIMINAL DEFAMATION AND CLAIM FOR DAMAGES.**

Dear Sir,

Under instructions from and on behalf of my Client, **Mr. Rajesh Kumar**, S/o Mr. Suresh Kumar, residing at Flat No. 1001, Prestige Towers, MG Road, Bengaluru, Karnataka - 560001, hereinafter referred to as "My Client," I hereby serve upon you the following Legal Notice:

1.  That My Client is a reputed professional and the Founder & CEO of **TechNova Solutions Pvt. Ltd.**, a company engaged in cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence and software development for the past 15 years. My Client has built an impeccable reputation for integrity, professionalism, and ethical business practices in the industry, both nationally and internationally.

2.  That My Client states that you, the Noticee, are the Editor-in-Chief of "The Daily Sentinel" News Portal, a news portal which has a wide readership/viewership and significant influence in the public domain.

3.  That on or about **January 15, 2026**, you, the Noticee, maliciously and with the sole intention to defame and injure the reputation of My Client and his company, published/caused to be published a false, scandalous, and defamatory article/post titled **"TechNova's CEO Linked to Shell Company Scam"** on your website at the URL: https://www.dailysentinel.in/article/technova-scam-2026.

4.  That the said article/post contains several false and baseless allegations, including but not limited to **"allegations of financial fraud," "misappropriation of company funds," and "tax evasion"**. These statements are utterly false, untrue, and have been made without any verification or due diligence, demonstrating a clear intent to cause maximum damage to My Client's standing.

5.  That the said defamatory publication was made with **malice aforethought** and constitutes a grave act of **defamation** both under the civil law (Tort of Defamation) and the criminal law of India, punishable under **Section 499 read with Section 500 of the Indian Penal Code, 1860**. The imputations contained in the said publication have lowered the moral and intellectual character of My Client in the estimation of others, including his business associates, investors, and the general public.

6.  That as a direct and foreseeable consequence of your defamatory act, My Client has suffered immense mental agony, loss of goodwill, and severe financial damage, including the potential loss of **a major investment deal with a US-based venture capital firm worth ₹50 Crores**. The damage to My Client's reputation is incalculable, but a conservative estimate of the loss and damages suffered is quantified at **Rupees Five Crores (₹5,00,00,000/-)**.

**NOW, THEREFORE, I, the undersigned Advocate, do hereby call upon you, the Noticee, through this Legal Notice, to do the following within a period of fifteen (15) days from the date of receipt of this Notice:**

a.  Immediately and unconditionally **withdraw and remove** the defamatory article/post titled "TechNova's CEO Linked to Shell Company Scam" from all platforms, including the specified URL, and ensure its complete deletion from all archives and search engine caches.
b.  Tender an **unconditional written apology** to My Client, to be published with the same prominence and on the same platforms as the original defamatory publication, acknowledging the falsity of the allegations.
c.  Pay a sum of **Rupees Five Crores (₹5,00,00,000/-)** to My Client as compensation for the irreparable loss of reputation, mental harassment, and business losses caused by your malicious act.

**TAKE FURTHER NOTICE** that upon your failure to comply with the requisitions contained hereinabove within the stipulated period of fifteen (15) days, My Client shall be constrained to initiate appropriate **Civil Suit for Damages** and **Criminal Proceedings** against you, both jointly and severally, under the relevant provisions of the Indian Penal Code, 1860, and other applicable laws, entirely at your risk, cost, and consequences, without any further reference to you.

A copy of this Notice is retained in my office for future reference and necessary action.

Yours faithfully,

(Signature)

**Ms. Priya Singh**
Advocate, High Court
Lex Juris Chambers
B/1234/2005
